sentences: Mis on alustatud, see tuleb ka lõpetada.
Nende sõnadega lõpetas mees oma jutu.
context: The word 'lõpetage' is the formal/plural imperative form of the verb 'lõpetama'. It means to finish, complete, end, stop or terminate something. This is the command form used when speaking to multiple people formally or showing respect. The dictionary definitions show it can be used for completing tasks (like finishing work or school), ending activities (stopping celebrations), terminating processes (ending correspondence), or even in more serious contexts like ending one's life. It implies bringing something to a conclusion or cessation.
